summary: A mashup of a fur skirt with a stripped down saviours\' hide - Lore friendly
descriptionHtml:
[color=lime]WezEllison\'s Barbaric Fur Armour[/color]

[color=yellow][size=2]Modders make these to make the game more enjoyable for you, I don\'t ask for money but if you like what you see please Endorse to show your appreciation, thankyou.[/size][/color]


[color=lime]Why have you done this?[/color]
I was playing around in nifskope \'cause I wanted a break from college work. I then came up with this design & I was just going to delete it but then I thought someone on nexus might actually want it. It is very basic and only took about 5 minutes (if that) to put it together.

At the moment it replaces the fur armour (the one with the fur skirt only) so you\'ll see bandits wearing it.

You can change it to replace any armour you wish, so let\'s say you want to replace the steel plate cuirass you would do this:-

body1m_0 ---Rename to---> nordplatem_0
body1m_1 ---Rename to---> nordplatem_1

[color=lime][size=2]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]
Extract the contents into your Skyrim Directory.


[color=Red][size=2]INCOMPATABILITIES[/size][/color]
If you\'ve got anything that changes or replaces the same armour I have.
author: WezEllison
